issue.title: Please release packages for different ROS versions

content.raw:
Let me clarify:

+ All the drcsim stack (sandia-hand, osrf-common and drcsim) is released following the rule: 1-ubuntu-distro matches 1-ros-distro. So currently we support:
    * precise - groovy (after move fuerte to groovy)
    * quantal - groovy
    * raring - hydro

* Following previous rule, I see no reason to have drcsim-groovy or drcsim-hydro. It is a direct matching between your ubuntu distro and the ROS distro. I'm afraid that drcsim team won't be able to support all kind of combinations of ubuntu - ROS, so this is difficult to change.

* It will be a hydro release for drcsim  in raring, I hope (drcsim-3.1) sometime as soon as possible. It is suffering a problem in ROS hydro with gazebo-ros-pkgs (officially hosted at ros.org)  after the release of gazebo-2.0. This is high priority to get fixed.

Hope it helps.
